tool_description: Social Media Data API in Real-Time.  -Get very useful and unique information.  -I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder News and announcements Telegram Channel https://t.me/logicApi
name: Social Media Data TT
title: Social Media Data TT

api_list.name: Video post comments V2
api_list.description: Get post comments. V2 returns much more data then the old endpoint

required_parameters.name: video_id
required_parameters.description:
Where to get vide id value?

For example in this video /@INFLUENCER/video/6818009093052189958 the id will be **6818009093052189958**

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of records to return:

- Default is 50
- Maximum is 150

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor

api_list.name: Music metadata
api_list.description:
Get music metadata

Basic metadata: number of posts,  direct url to the song(MP3) and etc

api_list.name: Music feed (Video posts)
api_list.description:
Get current music feed. 

- Endpoint will return an array of objects with very useful metadata. 
- Direct urls to the video , statistics and more.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the output number of records. 

- Default is 20
- Max number is 100

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination cursor. 
To get more videos, paste here **max_cursor** value that you have received in previous request response.

api_list.name: Video post comments
api_list.description: Get video post comments.

required_parameters.name: video_id
required_parameters.description:
Where to get vide id value?

For example in this video /@INFLUENCER/video/6818009093052189958 the id will be **6818009093052189958**

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description: Pagination cursor

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of records to return:

- Default is 40
- Maximum is 400

api_list.name: Trending feed (Video posts) V2
api_list.description:
Get trending feed V2. 

V2 - returns more data then older version of the endpoint, video without watermark and etc

- Endpoint will return an array of objects with very useful metadata. 
- Direct urls to the video , statistics and more.

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination cursor. 
To get next batch of videos, paste here **max_cursor** value that you have received in previous request response.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the output number of records. 

- Default is 12
- Max number is 12

api_list.name: Real-time user search
api_list.description:
Search for influencers by the keyword. 

- Very useful data will be returned in the response, if user is verified or not, users country and more

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the output number of records:

- Default is 10
- Maximum is 30

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description:
Skip N number of records in search result:

- Each response will have a value **has_more** if it is true then you can send next response with the same keyword but for example set **skip** value to 100
- It depends from the keyword it self, some keyword can find thousands of users

api_list.name: User followers list
api_list.description:
Get user followers:

- Before testing don't forget to fill out the username **OR** sec_uid inputs

optional_parameters.name: sec_uid
optional_parameters.description:
**Type** of a user id

**NOTE:** By using **sec_uid**, request will be executed faster then if you will use username

**NOTE:** **sec_uid** is not regular user id

**NOTE:** **sec_uid** can be obtained from the **User Information** endpoint

**NOTE:** **sec_uid** example: MS4wLjABAAAAv7iSuuXDJGDvJkmH_vz1qkDZYo1apxgzaxdBSeIuPiM

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description:
The influencer username. For example: **amazon**

- **NOTE:** By using **sec_uid** instead of the **username** request will be executed faster
- To use **sec_uid** use input field **BELOW**

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination cursor. 
To get next batch of followers, paste here **max_cursor** value that you have received in previous request response.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of records to return:

- Default is 100
- Maximum is 200

api_list.name: User metadata (information)
api_list.description: Get user metadata. Number of followers, followings , avatar url, description and more

optional_parameters.name: fresh
optional_parameters.description: Force to return fresh data(not cached)

api_list.name: Real-time hashtag search
api_list.description: Search for hashtags by keyword

api_list.name: Direct post url
api_list.description: Get direct post url

api_list.name: Hashtag feed (Video posts)
api_list.description:
Get current hashtag feed. 

- Before testing don't forget to fill out the name **OR** hashtag_id inputs
- Endpoint will return an array of objects with very useful metadata. 
- Direct urls to the video , statistics and more.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the output number of records. 

- Default is 100
- Max number is 500

optional_parameters.name: hashtag_id
optional_parameters.description:
**NOTE:** By using **hashtag_id**, request will be executed faster then if you will use hashtag name

**NOTE:** **hashtag_id** can be obtained from the **/live/hashtag** endpoint

**NOTE:** **hashtag_id** example: 4232322

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination cursor. 
To get more videos, paste here **max_cursor** value that you have received in previous request response.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description:
Hashtag name. For example: **duett**

- **NOTE:** By using **hashtag_id** instead of the hashtag **name** request will be executed faster
- To use **hashtag_id** use input field **BELOW**

api_list.name: Hashtag metadata (information)
api_list.description:
Get hashtag metadata

Basic informations as number of posts and etc

api_list.name: Hashtag metadata (information) V2
api_list.description:
Get hashtag metadata V2

V2 - returns more data then older version of the endpoint

api_list.name: Trending feed (Video posts)
api_list.description:
Get current trending feed. 

- Due to nature of this endpoint the **max_cursor** is not required. Each request can return different data by default
- Endpoint will return an array of objects with very useful metadata. 
- Direct urls to the video , statistics and more.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the output number of records. 

- Default is 20
- Max number is 20

api_list.name: Hashtag feed (Video posts) V2
api_list.description:
Get hashtag feed V2. 

V2 - returns more data then older version of the endpoint, video without watermark and etc

- Before testing don't forget to fill out the **name** query
- Endpoint will return an array of objects with very useful metadata. 
- Direct urls to the video , statistics and more.

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description:
Pagination cursor. 
To get more videos, paste here **max_cursor** value that you have received in previous request response.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the output number of records. 

- Default is 20
- Max number is 20

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Hashtag name. For example: **duett**

api_list.name: Video post metadata
api_list.description: Get single post metadata
